price: ወደ ሰሙድም ወንድማቸውን ሷሊሕን አላህን ተገዙ በማለት በእርግጥ ላክነው፡፡ ወዲያውም እነሱ የሚነታረኩ ሁለት ጭፍሮች ኾኑ፡፡
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمۡ صَٰلِحًا أَنِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ فَإِذَا هُمۡ فَرِيقَانِ يَخۡتَصِمُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā ilā thamūda akhāhum ṣāliḥan ani uʿ'budū al-laha fa-idhā hum farīqāni yakhtaṣimūna
